tool.name: view_file
tool.description: View the contents of a specific file. Useful for reading code, configuration files, or logs. Supports reading specific line ranges to handle large files. Always use absolute paths.

parameters.parameter: The absolute path to the file to view.
The starting line number (1-based) to read from.
The ending line number (inclusive) to read up to. If omitted, reads until end (or limit).

tool.name: list_dir
tool.description: List files and directories in a given path. Useful for exploring the file system structure and finding interesting files.

parameters.parameter: The absolute path to the directory to list.
If true, lists contents of subdirectories recursively.

tool.name: grep_search
tool.description: Search for a text pattern in files within a directory using grep. Useful for finding specific code snippets, variable names, or configuration values.

parameters.parameter: The absolute path to the file or directory to search in.
The text pattern or regex to search for.
If true, searches recursively in subdirectories.
If true, performs a case-insensitive search.
